note.p: Birth: The house over his father's office in London Wall, London, England (01 November 1791)
Death: The Mount, Hadley, near Barnet, Hertfordshire (13 December 1863)
Career: Surgeon, St Thomas's Hospital, London (1820-1853); Lecturer in anatomy, St Thomas's Hospital, London (by 1824); Professor of anatomy and surgery, Royal College of Surgeons, London (by 1824)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1865 vol 14 pp i-v
References: V Gold, 'Samuel Taylor Coleridge and the Appointment of J F Daniell, FRS, as Professor of Chemistry at King's College London' in NR 1973-4 vol 28 pp 25-29
